Fits pre-deployment to reduce risks in app lifecycles. **Frameworks:** OWASP MASVS (Mobile AppSec Verification Standard): L1 basic hygiene, L2 defense-in-depth, L3 high-risk. Key: M1 Platform Usage, M2 Insecure Storage (encrypt with Keystore), M3 Comm (TLS pinning), M4 Authentication (multi-factor, no weak crypto/passwords stored as plaintext; use secure tokens, rate-limiting), M5 Insufficient Crypto, etc. [owasp.org/MASVS]. NIST CSF: Identify (risks), Protect (access/input validation), Detect/Respond/Recover [nist.gov/cyberframework]. App stores: Google Play (VRP), Apple (App Review security). **Big Picture:** Reduces deployment risks in vetting/compliance; links CIA, OWASP Top 10, SDLC. **Sources:** OWASP MASVS v2 (2023), NIST CSF 2.0 (2024), LegitSecurity.com NIST checklists.
